originalText.text: Had received under eye fillers that were placed horribly under my eye and actually gave me bags. 2 years later and been to a few people to try to get it removed including them and they all been unsuccessful. I still have lumping fillers and regret it so much. Be careful with what you get done to your face because they will deny they ever did wrong after and would say they see nothing wrong when even the workers there are looking at you crazy. They only care about the money you spend there. Save your money and go to someone more professional.
